channel.title: Get Songs on Pictue comments menu., Fun if theres a picture that matches a song
channel.description:
Ok, I learned this neet-o (lol) trick to put songs on someones picture menu. I did this to my sisters boyfriend, he had a picture, so I put the 007 Theme song on it. EXAMPLE http://viewmorepics.myspace.com/index.cfm?...71-ec8bbdba21c5 1. Make a free account at Freewebs.com or use the one I use for music. Username:arminathmusic Pass:iforgot Please don't change the password. 2. Upload the song you want by going to the file manager. 3. After the song is uploaded, take the linkto this song and insert it in this string in the correct place
After that, paste the entire code in the comment pictures box, and submit. Done, There was one girl who made herself look blue, I put the smrufs themesong on it if you have any questions, contact me. Der. taken from:http://www.blitzmodz.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=2795

Ok, I learned this neet-o (lol) trick to put songs on someones picture menu. I did this to my sisters boyfriend, he had a picture, so I put the 007 Theme song on it.

  2. Upload the song you want by going to the file manager.

After that, paste the entire code in the comment pictures box, and submit.

Done, There was one girl who made herself look blue, I put the smrufs themesong on it
